CloseEventCode.summary: The code read-only property of the interface returns a WebSocket connection close code indicating the reason the server gave for closing the connection.

remarks.para:
-RFC 6455 (the WebSocket Protocol specification)
-WebSocket Close Code Number Registry (IANA)

CloseEventCode.value: An integer WebSocket connection close code in the range 1000 - 4999, indicating the reason the server gave for closing the connection.
